channel.title: coding on NYGC/AMNH Workshop on Microbial Ecology - Introduction to R

item.title: Figure customization and color scales
item.description: In this session we will change ggplot’s default choices for color and style and take control of final figure presentation. created in R with the ggpomological package Slides Color Scales slides Figure Design slides Compound Figures slides Excercises Color Scales Excercise (solutions) Figure Design Excercise (solutions) Compound Figures Excercise (solutions)

item.title: Data Wrangling and Data Visualization
item.description: In this session we will cover how to build data visualizations and perform data wrangling tasks artwork by @allison_horst Topic Slides Excercises 1 Aesthetic Mapping Slides Excercise 2 Visualizing Amounts Slides Excercise 3 Visualizing Distributions Slides Excercise 4 Data Wrangling 1 Slides Excercise 5 Data Wrangling 2 Slides Excercise 6 Know your Data Slides Excercise

item.title: Intro to R and Rstudio
item.description: This module will be a beginner’s introduction to R and Rstudio. created in R with the ggpomological package Topic Slides Excercises 1 Intro to R and R studio Slides n/a 2 Aesthetic Mapping Slides Excercise 3 Visualizing Amounts Slides Excercise
